amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 115-786 to require NOAA to conduct a study on all fees it charges the lobster industry and report those findings to Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Poliquin amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Poliquin.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Poliquin amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
